title: DJ Sona's Ultimate Skin Music - Kinetic Medley (by Draivanhoe)

embed.description: I created this medley using Reason 4, Audacity and my keyboard... all the sounds you're going to hear were played by me (except drums and obviously voices). I hope you'll like it! I'm too poor to buy this skin, so I decided to become the DJ, lel.

body: Ho creato un medley con la canzone della skin di DJ Sona! Spero vi piaccia... fatemi sapere cosa ne pensate!

replies.body:
Molto simpatica!
La sto ascoltando con piacere :)
